story:
Once upon a time in a far-off land, there lived a young bear named Boris. Boris was a curious and friendly bear who loved to explore the forest and spend time with his friends. Every night, Boris would look up at the twinkling stars in the sky before settling down in his cozy den for a good night's rest.

One day, Boris was out exploring the forest when he stumbled upon a magical clearing filled with glowing fireflies. The fireflies danced around him, lighting up the night with their soft glow. Intrigued by the fireflies, Boris asked them where they came from and why they were so special.

The fireflies told Boris that they were the guardians of the forest, spreading light and joy wherever they went. They explained that every night, they would fly around the forest, bringing light to the dark corners and chasing away any fears or worries that the animals might have.

Boris was amazed by the fireflies' kindness and bravery. He thanked them for their hard work and asked if he could join them in their nightly adventures. The fireflies happily agreed, welcoming Boris into their glowing circle.

From that night on, Boris joined the fireflies on their nightly rounds, spreading light and joy throughout the forest. The animals of the forest slept peacefully, knowing that Boris and the fireflies were watching over them.

And so, Boris and the fireflies became beloved heroes of the forest, their nightly adventures a source of comfort and wonder for all who lived there.

And as Boris settled down in his den each night, he would look up at the stars and smile, grateful for the magical friends he had found in the fireflies.

The end. Goodnight, sweet dreams, little one.
